subject: Fencing (Sport)
lead_paragraph: Mariel Zagunis of the United States retained her individual sabre world title, beating Olga Kharlan of Ukraine, 15-11, in the final at the world fencing championships in Paris.
snippet: Mariel Zagunis of the United States retained her individual sabre world title, beating Olga Kharlan of Ukraine, 15-11, in the final at the world fencing championships in Paris.
